author: Legal Correspondent
text:
The Supreme Court on Friday stayed criminal proceedings against ODI captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni in an Andhra Pradesh court for a picture published in a magazine showing him as Lord Vishnu.

A Bench led by Justice Dipak Misra issued notice to Yerraguntla Shyam Sundar, who had filed the complaint, on a petition by Mr. Dhoni, represented by Supreme Court advocate Liz Mathew, to transfer the case from Anantapur in Andhra Pradesh to Bengaluru in Karnataka.

Earlier, the Supreme Court had stayed criminal proceedings against the cricketer in a similar case against him in a Bengaluru court and had stayed the operation of a Karnataka High Court order refusing to stay proceedings against him.
title: SC stays criminal proceedings against Dhoni
